info.name: OVS - Dark 2017
info.description:
Based on "OVS - On Va Sortir, no pub, Dark Grey" by Zorglube.
The original was too dark for my taste and made many texts unreadable.
This one is brighter and usable by day or by night.
info.additionalInfo:
v2.0 01/2018: homogeneous and even brighter grey background than v1 to improve readability of flashy colours.
v2.1 03/2018: restored events colours; minor updates.
v2.2 10/2018: updated slide show, that was blank.
v2.3 08/2019: removed filters that were preventing the display of certain addresses of events (apparently when it was an actual address instead of vague indications).
